statements: SELECT * FROM integrated_data;
SELECT id, source_name, data_type FROM integrated_data WHERE integration_method = 'import';
SELECT source_id, integration_date FROM integrated_data ORDER BY integration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE source_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM integrated_data WHERE data_type = 'client';
SELECT id, source_name FROM integrated_data WHERE data_type = 'customer' ORDER BY integration_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE integration_method LIKE '%manual%'
SELECT id, source_name, integration_date FROM integrated_data WHERE source_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT source_name, integration_method FROM integrated_data WHERE source_name LIKE 'A%' OR source_name LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE data_type = 'product' AND integration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY integration_date
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_id = 1;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY data_source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE data_source_id = 2;
SELECT integration_id, integration_date FROM integrated_data ORDER BY integration_date ASC;
SELECT data_source_id, COUNT(*) FROM integrated_data GROUP BY data_source_id;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM data_sources
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_id = 1
SELECT data_source_type, data_source_name FROM data_sources ORDER BY data_source_name DESC
SELECT data_source_id, data_source_name, data_source_type FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_type = 'API'
SELECT data_source_id, data_source_type FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_name LIKE 'D%'
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM source1;
SELECT * FROM source2 WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT name, age, location FROM integrated_data WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, location, revenue FROM source2 WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM source1;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM source2 WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT name, location FROM integrated_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM source1 WHERE gender = 'Male' OR age < 30;
SELECT id, location, revenue FROM integrated_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age >= 25 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM source1;
SELECT name, data_entry_date FROM source1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM source2 WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM integrated_data ORDER BY integration_date DESC;
SELECT id, insights_text FROM business_insights WHERE insights_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM source1;
SELECT name, data_entry_date FROM source1 ORDER BY data_entry_date DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM source2 WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM integrated_data WHERE source1_id = 1 OR source2_id = 2;
SELECT insights_text AS insights, insights_date AS date FROM business_insights;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, s.sale_amount FROM employees e INNER JOIN sales s ON e.employee_id = s.quantity;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM sales WHERE order_id = o.order_id);
